issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Allow FileSystemDataset's file list to be lazy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8163](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8163). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A FileSystemDataset currently requires a full listing of files it contains on construction, so a scan cannot start until all files in the dataset are discovered. Instead it would be ideal if a large dataset could be constructed with a lazy file listing so that scans can start immediately.
